Package git.jluvisi.util

Enum Messages

Object
Enum<Messages>
Messages
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Messages>, Constable
public enum Messages
extends Enum<Messages>
Manage the messages in the plugin. This class stores the paths in the config as enums which can then be converted from enums to BaseComponent[] from the getMessage() method.

Get a message using the getMessage().
Raw, string messages can be obtained through getLegacyMessage()
 Example:
 
 player.spigot().sendMessage(new TextComponent(Messages.MUST_BE_PLAYER.getMessage()))

    • replacePlaceholder

      public static String replacePlaceholder​(String value, LinkedHashMap<String,​String> replaceValue)
      Replaces all placeholders in a string which was retrieved from the configuration file. This method will replace all placeholders with their respective values.
      Parameters:
      value - (String to replace placeholders on)
      replaceValue - (Actual placeholder, New Value) Set the placeholders of this hashmap like so: 
      
                     final LinkedHashMap placeHolderMap = new LinkedHashMap() {
                         {
                             put("%placeholder%", String.valueOf(configString));

                         }
                     };
      Returns:
      replaced string

    • getMessage

      public BaseComponent[] getMessage()
      Get the configuration message for the specified Enum. Does account for ChatColors. BaseComponent[] can be converted to TextComponents through the TextComponent(BaseComponent[]) constructor.
      Returns:
      BaseComponent[]
